verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: James Comey] [ARG1: the pee tape is fake because he did n’t spend the night in Moscow in 2013] . Flight records show that is false .
Donald Trump told James Comey [ARG1: the pee tape] [V: is] [ARG2: fake] [ARGM-CAU: because he did n’t spend the night in Moscow in 2013] . Flight records show that is false .
Donald Trump told James Comey the pee tape is fake because he [V: did] n’t spend the night in Moscow in 2013 . Flight records show that is false .
Donald Trump told James Comey the pee tape is fake because [ARG0: he] did [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: spend] [ARG1: the night] [ARGM-LOC: in Moscow] [ARGM-TMP: in 2013] . Flight records show that is false .
Donald Trump told James Comey the pee tape is fake because he did n’t spend the night in Moscow in 2013 . [ARG0: Flight records] [V: show] [ARG1: that is false] .
Donald Trump told James Comey the pee tape is fake because he did n’t spend the night in Moscow in 2013 . Flight records show [ARG1: that] [V: is] [ARG2: false] .
